# CookieManager.SetCookies method

Adds [`UriCookieHeader`](../UriCookieHeader.md) instances for one or more cookies from an HTTP cookie header to the [`CookieManager`](../CookieManager.md) for a specific URI.

```csharp
public void SetCookies(Uri uri, string cookieHeader)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| uri | The URI. |
| cookieHeader | The cookie header. |
